help-file.title: HARPY GARGOYLE
help-file.content:
Harpies are a race of bird people that come from the jungle climates of Khomani-Khan. A matriarchal system governs their towns, where the females are usually more powerful and dangerous. They are usually frail in physical form, but quite adept at the mystical arts. Harpies are slender and humanoid, with large wings. The most vital fact of the Harpy species is their alliance with no single race, as they are borne into the world neutral. They must complete a quest to choose their destiny in the world of Duris. Indeed, the harpy culture breeds those who follow the path of darkness, light, and even undeath.
Class list: Sorcerer, Conjurer, Ethermancer, Bard Statistics: Harpies are an aerial race that tend to be quick and hearty, yet not very strong. They are much more suited to magic than any combat classes. They regain their spell slots via 'tupor', a calming-state. Due to their bird- like nature, Harpies are constantly flying and have the ability to 'flutter' to avoid attack and their keen eyes can see farther than other races. Harpies cannot wear equipment on their feet or legs, yet they may wear horns. Innate abilities: fly, perception, dayvision, ultravision Strength: Harpies are extremely agile and dexterous creatures with hearty constitutions. Weakness: Harpies are usually considerably more frail than an average human, though slightly stronger than elvenkind. Due to their communion with the forces of wind and cold, Harpies must be at least resting or even asleep in order to tupor, thereby making them extremely prone to attack.
